entry.title: RAW DENIMS JORTS
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bluorng
Type: Jeans
Price: 7495.00

Description

THE RAW DENIM JORTS BY BLUORNG ARE PREMIUM, RELAXED-FIT BERMUDA SHORTS MADE FROM NON-PREWASHED DENIM, OFFERING A STURDY VINTAGE LOOK THAT EVOLVES WITH WEAR.

DESIGNED AS A STREETWEAR ESSENTIAL, THESE UNISEX JORTS SEAMLESSLY BLEND STYLE AND COMFORT, MAKING THEM A MUST-HAVE FOR ANY WARDROBE.

Details

100% COTTON DENIM

WEIGHT - 420GSM

EMBOSSED BRANDING

DRY CLEAN ONLY

shipping

SHIPPED WITHIN 24 HOURS.

FREE DELIVERY PAN-INDIA.

DISPATCH NEXT DAY.

entry.title: RAW DENIM JEANS
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bluorng
Type: Jeans
Price: 9995.00

Description

THE RAW DENIM PANTS BY BLUORNG ARE PREMIUM, OVERSIZED, UNISEX PANTS MADE FROM 100% RAW COTTON DENIM, FEATURING THE ICONIC BLUORNG LOGO.

WITH A FLARED BOTTOM AND REAR PATCHED POCKETS, THESE STREETWEAR ESSENTIALS SEAMLESSLY COMBINE STYLE AND COMFORT, MAKING THEM A MUST-HAVE FOR YOUR WARDROBE.
